data.name: Categorize The Information System
data.description: To categorize the system, the Cloud Service Provider (CSP) determines the information types to categorize what types of data are (or can be) contained within the system to determine the impact level for the system.

tests.title: Config Service Enabled
tests.description: Ensures the AWS Config Service is enabled to detect changes to account resources
tests.more_info: The AWS Config Service tracks changes to a number of resources in an AWS account and is invaluable in determining how account changes affect other resources and in recovery in the event of an account intrusion or accidental configuration change.
tests.recommended_action: Enable the AWS Config Service for all regions and resources in an account. Ensure that it is properly recording and delivering logs.

results.message: Config Service is not monitoring global services

data.name: Implement Security Controls
data.description: The Cloud Service Provider(CSP) selects the FedRAMP security control baseline, and then implements the security controls related to expected impact level.

tests.title: CloudTrail Bucket Delete Policy
tests.description: Ensures CloudTrail logging bucket has a policy to prevent deletion of logs without an MFA token
tests.more_info: To provide additional security, CloudTrail logging buckets should require an MFA token to delete objects
tests.recommended_action: Enable MFA delete on the CloudTrail bucket

tests.title: Minimum Password Length
tests.description: Ensures password policy requires a password of at least a minimum number of characters
tests.more_info: A strong password policy enforces minimum length, expirations, reuse, and symbol usage
tests.recommended_action: Increase the minimum length requirement for the password policy
tests.remediation_description: The password policy for minimum password length will be set to the value set by the user. Otherwise, it will default to 14.

results.message: Account does not have a password policy

tests.title: Password Requires Symbols
tests.description: Ensures password policy requires the use of symbols
tests.more_info: A strong password policy enforces minimum length, expirations, reuse, and symbol usage
tests.recommended_action: Update the password policy to require the use of symbols
tests.remediation_description: The password policy for password requires symbols will be set to true.

results.message: Account does not have a password policy

tests.title: Maximum Password Age
tests.description: Ensures password policy requires passwords to be reset every 180 days
tests.more_info: A strong password policy enforces minimum length, expirations, reuse, and symbol usage
tests.recommended_action: Descrease the maximum allowed age of passwords for the password policy
tests.remediation_description: The password policy for maximum password age will be set to the value set by the user. Otherwise, it will default to 179.

results.message: Account does not have a password policy

tests.title: Password Reuse Prevention
tests.description: Ensures password policy prevents previous password reuse
tests.more_info: A strong password policy enforces minimum length, expirations, reuse, and symbol usage
tests.recommended_action: Increase the minimum previous passwords that can be reused to 24.
tests.remediation_description: The password policy for password reuse prevention will be set to the value set by the user. Otherwise, it will default to 24.

results.message: Account does not have a password policy

tests.title: S3 Bucket All Users Policy
tests.description: Ensures S3 bucket policies do not allow global write, delete, or read permissions
tests.more_info: S3 buckets can be configured to allow the global principal to access the bucket via the bucket policy. This policy should be restricted only to known users or accounts.
tests.recommended_action: Remove wildcard principals from the bucket policy statements.
tests.remediation_description: Bucket policy will be deleted for affected buckets.

tests.title: Password Expiration
tests.description: Ensures password policy enforces a password expiration
tests.more_info: A strong password policy enforces minimum length, expirations, reuse, and symbol usage
tests.recommended_action: Enable password expiration for the account
tests.remediation_description: The password policy for password expiration will be set to true.

results.message: Account does not have a password policy

tests.title: Password Requires Lowercase
tests.description: Ensures password policy requires at least one lowercase letter
tests.more_info: A strong password policy enforces minimum length, expirations, reuse, and symbol usage
tests.recommended_action: Update the password policy to require the use of lowercase letters
tests.remediation_description: The password policy for password requires lowercase will be set to true.

results.message: Account does not have a password policy

tests.title: Password Requires Numbers
tests.description: Ensures password policy requires the use of numbers
tests.more_info: A strong password policy enforces minimum length, expirations, reuse, and symbol usage
tests.recommended_action: Update the password policy to require the use of numbers
tests.remediation_description: The password policy for password requires numbers will be set to true.

results.message: Account does not have a password policy

tests.title: Password Requires Uppercase
tests.description: Ensures password policy requires at least one uppercase letter
tests.more_info: A strong password policy enforces minimum length, expirations, reuse, and symbol usage
tests.recommended_action: Update the password policy to require the use of uppercase letters
tests.remediation_description: The password policy for password requires uppercase will be set to true.

results.message: Account does not have a password policy

tests.title: Open All Ports Protocols
tests.description: Determine if security group has all ports or protocols open to the public
tests.more_info: Security groups should be created on a per-service basis and avoid allowing all ports or protocols.
tests.recommended_action: Modify the security group to specify a specific port and protocol to allow.

tests.title: KMS Key Policy
tests.description: Validates the KMS key policy to ensure least-privilege access.
tests.more_info: KMS key policies should be designed to limit the number of users who can perform encrypt and decrypt operations. Each application should use its own key to avoid over exposure.
tests.recommended_action: Modify the KMS key policy to remove any wildcards and limit the number of users and roles that can perform encrypt and decrypt operations using the key.

tests.title: EKS Security Groups
tests.description: Ensures the EKS control plane only allows inbound traffic on port 443.
tests.more_info: The EKS control plane only requires port 443 access. Security groups for the control plane should not add additional port access.
tests.recommended_action: Configure security groups for the EKS control plane to allow access only on port 443.

tests.title: ECR Repository Policy
tests.description: Ensures ECR repository policies do not enable global or public access to images
tests.more_info: ECR repository policies should limit access to images to known IAM entities and AWS accounts and avoid the use of account-level wildcards.
tests.recommended_action: Update the repository policy to limit access to known IAM entities.

data.name: Change Control
data.description: Change Control is put in place to cater for the system changes that maybe not be initially in the configuration management plan which may impact FedRamp requirements.

tests.title: RDS Automated Backups
tests.description: Ensures automated backups are enabled for RDS instances
tests.more_info: AWS provides a simple method of backing up RDS instances at a regular interval. This should be enabled to provide an option for restoring data in the event of a database compromise or hardware failure.
tests.recommended_action: Enable automated backups for the RDS instance

data.name: Incident Response
data.description: The shared tenant architecture of cloud services implies that a single incident may impact multiple Federal Agencies leveraging the cloud services. FedRAMP works with US-CERT to coordinate incident response activities.

tests.title: RDS Restorable
tests.description: Ensures RDS instances can be restored to a recent point
tests.more_info: AWS will maintain a point to which the database can be restored. This point should not drift too far into the past, or else the risk of irrecoverable data loss may occur.
tests.recommended_action: Ensure the instance is running and configured properly. If the time drifts too far, consider opening a support ticket with AWS.

data.name: Operational Visibility
data.description: The goal of operational visibility is to reduce the administrative burden associated with demonstrating compliance and instead to shift toward real-time oversight monitoring through automated approaches.

tests.title: CloudWatch Monitoring Metrics
tests.description: Ensures metric filters are setup for CloudWatch logs to detect security risks from CloudTrail.
tests.more_info: Sending CloudTrail logs to CloudWatch is only useful if metrics are setup to detect risky activity from those logs. There are numerous metrics that should be used. For the exact filter patterns, please see this plugin on GitHub: https://github.com/cloudsploit/scans/blob/master/plugins/aws/cloudwatchlogs/monitoringMetrics.js
tests.recommended_action: Enable metric filters to detect malicious activity in CloudTrail logs sent to CloudWatch.
